torchlight 1 has no mp, and that means no lan. cant have lan without multiplayer. im pretty sure this contains a virus. wouldnt trust it, but i may be wrong...up to you. 

just keep in mind....the first torchlight game has NO MULTIPLAYER and that's what this is

Well I dont know about this one but I found that http://code.google.com/p/tlmp/ is working fine so far, tested it with my brother, here http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll279/Ninnetyer/TorchlightMultiplayer-1.jpg
